about_the_game:
Charlie and his childhood friend Jack go on a boat trip that turns into a nightmare. Trapped in a storm...
Charlie washes up on an abandoned fishing island...
From Charlie's camera archives...

you'll 'experience' what really happened after the police recovered the footage from Charlie's camera. Inspired by a True Story.
Archive 1985 and a first-person horror game where you have to find your friend JACK and find the exit through the different puzzles to solve.

Archive 1985 and based on real events, two friends go on excursions on their boats and find themselves in a storm.
Charlie is stuck on an abandoned fishing island where he must find his friend Jack and try to escape the island.
Different puzzles are to solve in this place haunted by an "evil" presence called Megane.
The player must manage his fear, the flashlight battery, take notes to solve puzzles..
Unlike other horror games I would say that "Archive 1985" stands out from the others thanks to its environment, you are not necessarily in the dark,
you have clear "daytime" places, with your camera the games brings an "ultra-realistic" style "bodyCam" with different variable environments that
plunges you into a «hellish» world
or you should try to control your "stress".
Through a storyline rich in stories, understand what it really is to spend on this island and how to escape it without going completely crazy!

The game is still in development and will be released in 2024.
The available translations will be: English/French/Russian/Spanish.
A lot of graphical improvement and especially in terms of gameplay and others are still in development.
